com.myscript.atk.gew

Interface GeometryWidgetApi


  • public interface GeometryWidgetApi

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static interface  GeometryWidgetApi.OnConfigureListener
      Interface definition for callbacks to be invoked at the beginning and end of the resource update process.
      static interface  GeometryWidgetApi.OnGestureListener
      Interface definition for callbacks to be invoked when gestures are detected.
      static interface  GeometryWidgetApi.OnLabelViewCreatedListener
      Interface definition for callbacks to be invoked when creation of a label view is needed.
      static interface  GeometryWidgetApi.OnRecognitionListener
      Interface definition for callbacks to be invoked at the beginning and end of a recognition session.
      static interface  GeometryWidgetApi.OnSelectionListener
      Interface definition for callbacks to be invoked when selection actions are detected.
      static interface  GeometryWidgetApi.OnUndoRedoListener
      Interface definition for callbacks to be invoked when at least one of Undo/Redo stacks has changed.
      static interface  GeometryWidgetApi.OnWritingListener
      Interface definition for callbacks to be invoked when the user is writing.
      static class  GeometryWidgetApi.PrimitiveType

    • Method Detail

      • setInkColor

        void setInkColor(int color)
        Set the color of the ink. Default color is #FF4B5775.
        Parameters:
        color - Color of the ink.

      • setInkThickness

        void setInkThickness(int thickness)
        Set the thickness of the ink. Default value is 2 pixels.
        Parameters:
        thickness - Thickness of the ink.

      • setInkDashed

        void setInkDashed(boolean dashed)
        Dash aspect for the ink.

      • setBackgroundColor

        void setBackgroundColor(int color)
        Set the background color of the writing area. Default is #FFFFFFFF
        Parameters:
        color - Color of the background.

      • setBackgroundDrawable

        void setBackgroundDrawable(Drawable drawable)
        Set a background to the write area. Default is millimeter_background.
        Parameters:
        drawable - Pattern or image to apply.

      • setEnginePath

        void setEnginePath(String path)
        Define the location of the geometry recognition engine.

        The geometry recognition engine is automatically loaded from default native libraries locations:

        1. Application bundled native libraries directory
        2. System libraries under 
           /system/lib
          directory

        You can choose to load the geometry recognition engine from a different path using this function.

        Parameters:
        path - Path to native libraries of geometry recognition.

      • setResourcesPath

        void setResourcesPath(String path)
        Define the location of the geometry recognition resources.

        The geometry recognition resources are automatically loaded from default application data location:

        1. Application bundled data directory

        You can choose to load the geometry recognition resource from a different path using this function.

        Parameters:
        path - Path to geometry resources

      • setOnConfigureListener

        void setOnConfigureListener(GeometryWidgetApi.OnConfigureListener l)
        Register a callback to be invoked at the beginning and end of a configuration process.
        Parameters:
        l - Listener to attach to this widget.
        See Also:
        GeometryWidgetApi.OnConfigureListener

      • configure

        void configure(Context context,
             String[] resources,
             byte[] certificate)
        Configure the geometry recognition engine.

        This function is non-blocking and returns immediately.

        Configuration is a lengthy process that may take up to several seconds, depending on the geometry resource attached. It is recommended to set up a configure listener to detect the end of the configuration process.

        Parameters:
        context - Android context
        resources - Array of paths to geometry resource files.
        certificate - Byte array containing the geometry recognition certificate.
        See Also:
        GeometryWidgetApi.OnConfigureListener

      • release

        void release(Context activity)
        Release current geometry recognition engine.
        Parameters:
        context - The Android context

      • getErrorString

        String getErrorString()
        Return a string describing the error that happened during the configuration, if any.
        Returns:
        String describing the error.

      • setOnRecognitionListener

        void setOnRecognitionListener(GeometryWidgetApi.OnRecognitionListener l)
        Register a callback to be invoked at the beginning and end of a recognition session.
        Parameters:
        l - The listener to attach to this widget.
        See Also:
        GeometryWidgetApi.OnRecognitionListener

      • getResultAsImage

        Bitmap getResultAsImage(Context context,
                      Drawable background)
        Get the recognition result as an image.
        Parameters:
        context - The Android context.
        background - Background resource id to use instead of current. Null for current background
        Returns:
        Bitmap preview of the result.

      • clear

        void clear(boolean allowUndo)
        Clear the ink, text and all related objects like redo stack. This also clears the screen.
        Parameters:
        allowUndo - Indicates whether the undo stack must be updated with a clear step.

      • isEmpty

        boolean isEmpty()
        Indicate whether the widget content is empty or not.
        Returns:
        true if widget content is empty.

      • setPalmRejectionEnabled

        void setPalmRejectionEnabled(boolean enabled)
        Enable or disable palm rejection. Enabled by default.
        Parameters:
        enabled - The new state (enabled or disabled).

      • setPalmRejectionLeftHanded

        void setPalmRejectionLeftHanded(boolean leftHanded)
        Set palm rejection as left-handed or right-handed. Right-handed by default.
        Parameters:
        leftHanded - True for a left-handed palm rejection configuration. Right-handed by default.

        l - The listener to attach to this widget.
        See Also:
        GeometryWidgetApi.OnGestureListener

      • getEnabledConstraints

        int getEnabledConstraints(GWConstraintBehavior behavior)
        Return the constraints for which the specified behavior is active.
        Parameters:
        behavior - The behavior
        Returns:
        An integer bit mask that determines the constraints for which the specified behavior is active.

      • setEnabledConstraints

        void setEnabledConstraints(boolean enabled,
                         int constraints,
                         GWConstraintBehavior behavior)
        Enable or disable detection and display of implicit and explicit constraints.
        Parameters:
        enabled - A boolean specifying if the constraints should be enabled or disabled
        constraints - An integer bit mask that determines the affected constraints
        behavior - The affected behavior

      • serialize

        byte[] serialize()
        Serialize the current input and recognition result as a byte array.
        Returns:
        the corresponding byte array. Only readable using unserialize.

      • unserialize

        boolean unserialize(byte[] data)
        Restore an input and recognition result saved using serialize method.
        Parameters:
        data - the byte array to unserialize, provided by serialize.
